          <title>
            <string language="ca">Hidrografia? D'on ve aquesta paraula?</string>
            <string language="en">Hydrography? Where does the word come from?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hydrographie? Woher kommt das Wort?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Hydrographie ? D'où est-ce que le mot 
vient ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Hydrography? De onde a palavra vem?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Idrografia? Da dove la parola viene?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Υδρογραφία; Πού η λέξη προέρχεται από;</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Pregunta amb resposta que explica l'origen i el significat de la paraula hidrografia.</string>
            <string language="en">Question and answer on the origin and meaning of the word 'hydrography'.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">geografia</string>
            <string language="en">geography</string>
            <string language="es">geografía</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">medi geofísic</string>
            <string language="en">geophysical environment</string>
            <string language="es">medio geofísico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">curs d'aigua</string>
            <string language="en">watercourse</string>
            <string language="es">curso de agua</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Fragen Sie und antworten Sie auf dem Ursprung und der 
Bedeutung des Wortes ' Hydrographie '.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Interrogez et répondez sur l'origine et la signification 
du mot 'hydrographie '.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Questione e responda na origem e no meaning da palavra ' 
hydrography '.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Domanda e risponda a sull'origine e sul significato della 
parola 'l'idrografia '.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ερωταποκρίσεις στην προέλευση και τη σημασία της λέξης
"υδρογραφία".</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geographie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
